name: Plant Empires: Arena Game
description:
Plant Empires is conceptualized to be a mobile game that combines the elites of tower defense, role-playing, and strategy gaming genres. The zombie plant game features familiar concepts and straightforward actions, allowing players to rapidly become immersed in the game. Each variety of Plant in Plant Empires has its own skin, strength, and skills, contributing to intriguing battles for players. When entering the realm of Plant Empires, players can employ plants to defeat Zombies, monsters, and bosses, win adventure & arena combat, and take valuable rewards.

▶ UNLEASH THE POWER OF HUNDREDS OF PLANTS TO DEFEAT THE ZOMBIES

Plant Empires has an impressive collection of plants with over 100 plants divided into many classes and rarities. Players can use their unlimited creativity to combine their favorite squad and start conquering the outrageous zombies. Plant Empires also has an unbelievably variable Zombies division with many special skills, waiting to eat your brain. Get ready to protect the Earth before the zombies get what they want!

▶ OUTSTANDING GRAPHIC AND AUDIO QUALITY

Plant Empires has marvelous graphic and audio quality, promising to bring players a comprehensive and funny gaming experience.

▶ ADVENTURE, ARENA AND MANY MORE

Traditional adventure mode is no longer an obstacle for you? Think that your anti-zombies strategy is the best? Come and compete with other players from all over the world! Get to the highest possible rank and get Gold, plants to become even stronger. Additionally, there will be many special events for you to discover: Boss events, Rank Leaderboard events, etc.
Download Now!
